description: This file is a shell script for initializing and controlling the 'sysevent_proxy' service. It includes functions to start, stop, and restart the service, as well as handling different platform conditions and managing process monitoring. The script interacts with other system components like sysevent daemon and pmon, and manages service states and process IDs.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service, retrieves configuration parameters via utctx_cmd, and sets the script file path.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the sysevent proxy service, managing different configurations for bootstrap and local sysevent daemons, and calling the monitor process.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the sysevent proxy service by unsetting process monitoring, killing the proxy process, and cleaning up PID files.
